text: 1:8 Jon 20:29; 2 Korin 5:7; Hibru 11:1; 11:27; 1 Jon 4:20Ezɨ ia an ganizir puvatɨ, egha ia a gifuegha uan naviba isa a ganɨngi. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn ia an gari puvatɨ, egha ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikia egha bar akonge. Agoroger kam a nguazir kamɨn bizir maba bar dagh afira, ezɨ e a mɨkɨmamin akabagh asa.
